200040.flavor: [Everything will be drained... everything will lose its life before my eye... there's no difference between friend or foe... it will show mercy for no one... Ugh... g.. Get away!!]

200041.name: Council Justice
200041.ability: If you have a follower with "Student Council" in the name on your field, then two random enemy followers get the following effects depending on how many Vita followers you have on your field. 1: -2 Atk. 2: -3 Sta. 3 or more: -2/-1/-2 Atk/Def/Sta.
200041.flavor: [The heavens call! The earth calls! The people call! They call upon me to strike down delinquents! I am the righteous student council! Inspector!]

200042.name: Student Council Kick

200043.name: Book Thief

200048.flavor: [M... master Cinia! Spare me!] [I'm just turning you into a frog for a little bit. I'll turn you back right away.] [No!!!]

200049.name: Shoddy Magic
200049.ability: Two random enemy followers lose -4 Sta or -2 Sta (50% chance).

300534.name: L. Cinia Pacifica

300534.flavor: [It's been a while since I've left the house, but going out is good, too. I heard that cute animals can be found at some place... Maybe I'll try going there?]

300095.name: Seeker Melissa

120018.name: SS Pursuer Four

200156.name: Protective Chant

120010.name: True Vampire God

120011.name: Shining Form Nexia
120011.ability: At the beginning of the turn, the first card in your Grave is moved to the bottom of your deck. All allied followers gain +3/+3 Atk/Sta.
120011.flavor: [Did you see... the past? The path that you came on... the past of those that you know... I will test your right... to continue to the future!]

120012.name: Vita Principal

120013.name: Vernika's Sorrow
120013.ability: At the beginning of the turn, all spells in your opponent's hand are sent to the Grave. A random card from your Grave is moved to the bottom of your deck. If your character's Life is 5 or less, both characters' life becomes the average between the two, and all cards on both players' fields are sent to the Grave.
120013.flavor: [It's depressing. Why can't I receive love? I just want someone by my side. I would give everything just to be with someone. I can't be saved from my loneliness.]

120014.name: Rio

120014.flavor: [One day, your wishes will come true. How about now?]

200154.name: Unity March

200154.flavor: [All for one and one for all. With the bond of trust, our combined strength is great!]

120016.name: Instigator L Red Sun

120016.flavor: [Guard your faith. Stay true to your beliefs. God is watching over us.]

120017.name: Knight Captain Eisenwane
120017.ability: At the beginning of the turn, all cards in your Grave are moved to the bottom of your deck. All followers in your deck gain +1/+1 Atk/Sta.
120017.flavor: [The aloof knight captain stands alone. Her appearance seems odd, and the parrot on her shoulder speaks instead of her.]

110040.name: Shadow Gart

110040.flavor: [Do you know how girls like you turn out when you're older?] [We're already 200.] [Sorry...]

110041.name: Shadow Ginger
110041.ability: At the beginning of the turn, all allied followers with Size equal or greater than the number of cards in your field gain +1/+1 Atk/Sta.
110041.flavor: [You little brats! Stay right there! I'm coming to beat you two up!] [Bo~ring~] [Don't you have something more creative, sister Sage? It's so~~~~~oo stale. You have to come up with a more creative joke!]

110042.name: Shadow Laevateinn
110042.ability: At the beginning of the turn, if you have at least two cards in your hand with the same Size, your character gains Life equal to half (rounding up) the Size of those cards.
110042.flavor: [The game is over. You're going to pay for your sins now.] [Ahhhh..!! Sister sage is scary...] [My name is Esprit...]

200155.name: A Single Flower
200155.ability: All cards in your hand and your opponent's hand are moved to the bottom of the owners' decks. Your character gains Life equal to the difference in the number of sent cards between you and your opponent.
200155.flavor: [We didn't know her name, but that single flower had the beauty of a small beginning.]

110044.name: Wind Girl X
110044.ability: At the beginning of the turn, your character gains +2 Life.
110044.flavor: [You have to eat and grow up properly!]

110045.name: Drill Sgt. Pippin

110045.flavor: [The start is always the most important part! It's forbidden to relax just because it's the beginning!]

110046.name: Drill Sgt. Rena

110046.flavor: [Nothing is difficult. I am just telling you how to protect people.]

110047.name: New Medic Lina

110048.name: Clerk Cecilia

110048.flavor: [You should mind your manners in an official position. Even the most trivial comments will be recorded.]

200152.name: Curse of Distrust

300508.name: Before School Student Council President

200401.name: Library Club Assistant

200401.flavor: [Milka senpai is too inflexible. I don't have authority, but I can give a few tips.]

200150.flavor: [From today, I am your master. What kind of exciting life awaits us?]

200151.name: Comfort
200151.ability: The first follower on your field is deactivated. If this happens, your character gains +3 Life.
200151.flavor: [Ahh... Cinia. Hold me...] [How interesting, while you're in my arms, you call out for another girl?]

210001.name: Sword
210001.flavor: [A sword made of Talentium. Everyone has forgotten where this metal came from. More importantly, it is almost frightening how obsessed people are with it. -Esprit's memo...]

210003.name: Shoes
210003.flavor: [Heels are added to raise the wearer's eye level. However, it's hard to say if girls want to see higher or if they just want to have more pride. Regardless, I prefer comfortable shoes. -Esprit's memo...]

210002.name: Glasses
210002.flavor: [Talentium has found its way into our everyday lives. Because the metal is easily processed, people began mixing it into all kinds of objects. -Esprit's memo...]

210005.name: Ribbon
210005.flavor: [It's a long piece of cloth used to tie things. You can use it to tie a variety of things. You could wrap a package, or you could tie your hair with it. Last week, I used a ribbon to wrap a present for my neighbor's daughter's birthday. -Esprit's memo...]

210004.name: Stockings
210004.flavor: [Socks used to be just another garment to keep oneself warm, but now they have a variety of appearances. At some point, their purpose changed. I like the overknee type with a ribbon. -Esprit's memo...]

210007.name: Book
210007.flavor: [It's been a few years since I started writing notes so I wouldn't forget things. However, as the notes began piling up, it became difficult to organize them. These days, I don't remember where I wrote what. -Esprit's memo...]

210006.name: Cat Doll
210006.flavor: [It's a cat doll that looks like it's out of a fairy tale. I gave one to my neighbor's daughter for her birthday. She often talks to it, and she frequently has conversations with it over tea. -Esprit's memo...]

210009.name: Green Ore
210009.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, green Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

210008.name: Red Ore
210008.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, red Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

300218.flavor: [Tell me. Even after thinking hard about it, I still don't know. Tell me. How could you abandon sister? Tell me. Do you really live me? Did sister really try to kill me? ... You. I'll kill you.]

300219.name: Blue Cross Assistant
300219.flavor: [We don't ask any questions to those we help. The Blue Cross is that kind of group.]

300216.name: Rainy Blue Lady
300216.ability: Before defending, if your character belongs to Academy, the first card with "Maid" in the name and the first Academy card without "Maid" in the name are moved from your hand to the bottom of your deck. If this happens, a random enemy follower on the field is moved to the bottom of your opponent's deck, then this ability is removed.
300216.flavor: [She said she can't forget that person. When their hearts don't touch, only one of them is trash that can still feel happy. Just go kill yourself.]

300217.name: Agent Nold
300217.ability: Before defending, if the attacking follower's Size is equal or greater than this card's Size, that follower gains +1/+1 Atk/Sta and is moved to the top of your deck. If this happens, this card loses -2/-2 Atk/Sta and is moved to the top of your opponent's deck, then this ability is removed.
300217.flavor: [Begin the operation. After securing the target student, obtaining the information will be a simple task...]

300214.name: Bass Maid

300215.name: Drum Maid

300212.name: Guide Maid Guitarian

300211.name: 2S Agent Thirteen

300211.flavor: [Don't stand behind me. I don't like anyone following me.]

200308.name: Quick like the wind

200308.flavor: [Yes? A delivery? Where would you like it delivered?]

200303.name: Memory

200301.flavor: [This is a book recommendation for my treasured friend. Please treat it with care...]

200307.name: Sanctuary Exploration

200307.flavor: [What's that! Why is something like that here? It's regrettable, but I'll use this disposable artifact...]

200306.name: Chaos Crossing

200306.flavor: [The mystery of the witch is a mystery. The birdcage is used to lock up birds.]

200305.name: Lady's Rest

200305.flavor: [For the sake of beauty, of course I must rest right now. 11 o' clock?]

200304.name: Protection

200275.name: Cursed Totem
200275.ability: A random enemy follower gets the following effects depending on this card's slot number, then this card is deactivated and remains on the field. 1: -2 Sta. 2: -1/-1 Atk/Sta. 3: -1/-2 Atk/Sta. 4: -2/-2 Atk/Sta. 5: -2/-3 Atk/Sta. If the turn number is odd, a random enemy spell is deactivated.
200275.flavor: [Put it in the basement of the cathedral. It will alter the fate of the unstoppable Crux.]

200277.name: Rainy Day
200277.ability: The turn number is increased by 2, and all enemy followers lose -2/-2 Atk/Sta.
200277.flavor: [It's raining. I have a strange feeling. I somewhat remember getting soaked by the rain before, too, but I must have tried to erase it from my memory...]

200276.name: Sacred Tutor
200276.ability: A random follower in your opponent's hand is moved to the first empty slot of your opponent's field.
200276.flavor: [I found it. It's here, too. As I thought, it was scattered throughout the world!]

300328.name: Council Press Student
300328.ability: Before attacking, all allied followers with "Student Council" in the name gain +1 Atk. // Before defending, all allied followers with "Student Council" in the name gain +1 Sta.
300328.flavor: [I want to capture a cool image of the student council. No matter the time or place, I'll be with you!]

300329.name: Producer Maid

200273.flavor: [I'm putting everything on this research. I'll show my true self to those scientists who have been ignoring me.]

200272.name: Sanctuary Pillar

200272.flavor: [This place, where the pinwheel turns, is the place of a god. Which god, I do not know, but at the very least, I know that it is not the goddess of Crux.]

200271.name: Joining the Knights

200271.flavor: [To hide a tree, go to the forest... after seeing Veltier, who had abandoned her own appearance, Rosa made a decision to avoid the eyes of Crux.]

200270.name: Artificer
200270.ability: Two random allied followers with "Seeker" in the name gain Atk/Sta equal to the number of abilities they possess+1.
200270.flavor: [Her ability to handle artifacts is the highest. Her title of Artificer is not for show.]

300322.name: Sword Girls Cinia
300322.ability: At the beginning of the turn, the first follower in your deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original abilities and is moved to the first empty slot in your field. If this happens, that follower gains +3 Sta and this follower is moved to the bottom of your deck. // Before attacking, all allied followers gain +3 Sta, this follower gets -1 Size, then this ability is removed.
300322.flavor: [I found it!! I didn't think it would be in this world.]

300323.name: Animal Suit Cinia
300323.ability: Before attacking, the defending follower gets the following effects depending on the number of cards on your field with "Cinia" in the name. 1: -1/-1 Atk/Sta. 2: -1/-2 Atk/Sta. 3 or more: -2/-3 Atk/Sta.
300323.flavor: [Cinia, it suits you.] [Sister Linia? I do like pandas, but... these clothes are too much. Please give me something else to wear. Fashion king? What's that?]

300320.name: Sword Girls Sita
300320.ability: At the beginning of the turn, the first follower in your deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original abilities and is moved to the first empty slot in your field. If this happens, that follower gains +3 Sta and this follower is moved to the bottom of your deck. // Before attacking, all allied followers gain +2/+1 Atk/Sta, then this ability is removed.
300320.flavor: [Esprit muttered that there was something she could use to modifiy it somewhere in her room.]

300321.name: Animal Suit Sita
300321.ability: Before defending, this card gets bonuses depending on the number of cards on your field with "Sita" in the name. 1: Def=1, +1 Sta. 2: Def=2, +2 Sta. 3 or more: Def=2, +3 Sta.
300321.flavor: [Vernika, what are these clothes?] [You're cute, Sita! With this concept, we can win fashion king!] [I don't feel like going.] [Sita, come on~ okay?]

300326.name: Sword Girls Iri
300326.ability: At the beginning of the turn, the first follower in your deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original abilities and is moved to the first empty slot in your field. If this happens, that follower gains +3 Sta and this follower is moved to the bottom of your deck. // Before defending, all allied followers get -1 Size and this follower gains +2 Sta, then this ability is removed.
300326.flavor: [Esprit is obsessed with the girls from another world.]

300327.name: Animal Suit Iri
300327.ability: Before attacking, the defending follower gets the following effects depending on the number of cards on your field with "Iri" in the name. 1: -2 Sta. 2: -3 Sta. 3 or more: -4 Sta.
300327.flavor: [Wh, what's the reason for wearing a costume of such a low-class thing! Explain it to me!] [If you had given me more time and money...] [No excuses! We can't win fashion king like this!]

300324.name: Sword Girls Luthica
300324.ability: At the beginning of the turn, the first follower in your deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original abilities and is moved to the first empty slot in your field. If this happens, that follower gains +3 Sta and this follower is moved to the bottom of your deck. // Before defending, all allied followers gain +1/+2 Def/Sta, then this ability is removed.
300324.flavor: ["Sister Sage, what are you doing?" She didn't hear.] ["Luthica... Ha ha..."]

300325.name: Animal Suit Luthica
300325.ability: Before attacking, this follower gains the following effects depending on the number of cards on your field with "Luthica" in the name. 1: +1/+1 Atk/Sta. 2: +1/+2 Atk/Sta. 3 or more: +2/+3 Atk/Sta.
300325.flavor: [Luthica, how do you like your new pajamas? Lu, Luthica? Even though they're pajamas, you still need to wear something underneath. Oh no, what's that string?!] [It, it's a sacrifice for the sake of fashion... sniff.]

200459.name: Summon
200459.ability: If your field contains a follower with "Knight" in the name and a follower with "Seeker" in the name, all allied followers gain +4 Atk.
200459.flavor: [Where the hell did everyone else run off to!]

200458.name: Covert Operation

200458.flavor: [I will do as my sister says... Yes, Linia.]

200457.name: Rift
200457.ability: If this card's Size is at least 3, two random allied followers lose -2/-2 Atk/Sta and the enemy character gains +2 Life. Otherwise, this card gets +1~2 Size and is moved to the first empty slot of your opponent's field and deactivated.
200457.flavor: [Haha. Magnificent. Soon, I will be able to send people as well. Who shall I use as a test subject?]

200456.name: Altar of Kana
200456.ability: All followers with Sta that is odd lose -3 Sta and all followers with Sta that is even gain +3 Atk.
200456.flavor: [In order to obtain the mystical ore, you perform a ritual for the Creator at this place. In order to unlock it, three things are needed. A key, a shaman, and a sacrifice...]

200455.name: Talentium Veritas
200455.ability: If your character belongs to Vita, two of the following effects are applied (randomly chosen): "Your character gains +3 Life." "All allied followers gain +3/+3 Atk/Sta." "The enemy character loses -1 Life." "All enemy followers lose -3/-3 Atk/Sta." "The first enemy card is removed from the game."
200455.flavor: [Talentium? I don't know anything about that weird imitation that you're referring to. The only thing I know as Talentium is in this place.]

200454.name: Minority Report
200454.ability: All followers on your field with "Cook Club" in the name have their Size and first ability changed to the Size and first ability of the second follower on your field with "Cook Club" in the name.
200454.flavor: [That white hair... I know I've seen her somewhere before...]

200453.name: Following Memory
200453.ability: A random enemy follower whose Def is equal to (10-the total Size of your field) is moved to the bottom of your opponent's deck.
200453.flavor: [What? I thought I was the only one who could enter this imaginary sector.] [It was a simple deduction. Sorry, but in order for us to escape, I'll need your cooperation.]

200452.name: Engagement
200452.ability: If your character belongs to Darklore, a random enemy follower loses Sta equal to the difference between its Atk and Def.
200452.flavor: [What the..! You bastard!] [We'll talk after I defeat everyone here. Starting with you!]

200451.name: The battle begins

200450.name: GS 5th Star's Strength

200222.name: Talentium Ingot

200223.name: Vernika's Nightmare

Follower: "Two random enemy followers lose -4/-4 Atk/Sta." Spell: "All spells on your opponent's field are sent to the Grave."
